K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:299b-31: rig pa gnyis su med par gyur ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-2: thugs rdo rje ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po la dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-5: thugs rdo rje ye shes lhag pa'i snying po mdzes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-8: thugs rdo rje ye shes rgyan chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po la nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje ye shes chen po la 'ba' zhig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-10: sgo mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-11: nam mkha'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-12: aa de [?] dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-13: 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-15: gzhan yang ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo stong phrag brgyal 'ang 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-16: mda'i mtshon cha'i lag ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300a-17: dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-0: nye bar zhi ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i @300b rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-1: gyen du lta ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-2: 'dod pa'i zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-3: brda' sprod pa ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-4: 'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-5: rol pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-6: 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-7: dbang phyug gi bde [?] ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-8: dmigs pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-9: brang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-10: de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-12: dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-14: snying bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-15: gdug pa thams cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-16: rjes su mnyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-17: khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-18: thams cad 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen po la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas pa'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:300b-22: rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-1: ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-2: 'jig pa'i yan lag can zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-3: thog ma pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-4: gdul dka' 'dul zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-6: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-8: sku gsung thugs thams cad rdo rjes 'ching ba ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-9: 'jigs pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-10: gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-11: 'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-12: bskal bar gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-14: dpe med pa'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-17: kun nas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-18: 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301a-19: rab tu dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-0: thams @301b cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen po la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-2: nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yab rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste; de'ang 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-3: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i yab chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-4: mkha' 'gro'i rdo rje dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-9: skye bo yongs su dor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-14: gdug pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-15: de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-23: de dag la sogs pa rdo rje yab rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-25: mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje bran po rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs gcig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-27: rdo rje rlung zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-32: rdo rje rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-34: rgyas par byed pa pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:301b-36: mi shes pa thams cad zad par byed pa ste de dag la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-0: mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas @302a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-1: pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ston pa rtag pa mchog gi mnga' bdag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-2: kun tu bzang po'i sku yi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-4: bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin legs bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-5: gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dus pa thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-8: rdo rje'i glu 'dis mngon par bstod nas zhu ba zhus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-9: sangs rgyas kun don khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-11: thugs kyi rin chen mchog khyod 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-12: chos kyi blo gros khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-13: chos rnams kun mchog khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-14: sna tshogs dgongs pa khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-15: dam tshig mchog gi khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-17: grags pa chen po bdag cag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-18: mgon po khyod la zhu ba zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-0: de bzhin @302b gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-1: 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams dad par mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-2: rang gi sems yongs su sun 'byin la des ma mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-3: mnar med pa rnams su skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-4: de brgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-5: mi rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-7: blo gros chung ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-14: seng ge'i nga ro 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-15: de dag 'dre bar mi bya zhing blta bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-18: ji ltar sems can de rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:302b-20: gang gis 'di'i ming gzung na yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-0: bsod nams de'i rgyus de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad de bla na med pa yang dag par @303a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-2: de nas de dag yid dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-6: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-7: bde ba'i phyir gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu bzang po chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-9: 'od 'phro ba gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-12: thugs rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dam pa 'di bka' stsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-13: dkyil 'khor kun gyi yum gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-14: stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-15: ci zhig nga yis bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-16: rtogs pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-17: sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-18: gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-19: de kun sgyu mas sgyu ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-20: 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-21: des na sgyu ma lta bu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-22: sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-23: nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-24: thams cad yum gyis yang dag 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303a-25: phyi rol yang ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-0: gsang ba'i @303b dkyil 'khor yum rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-1: dben zhing dga' ba'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-2: yid kyi legs par 'dus byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-3: nam mkha' la ni thig gis gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-4: thog mar de yi dam pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-5: de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-6: gsang ba'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-7: mu khyud dag gi rnam bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-8: kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-9: dbus kyis cha ru dkyil 'khor ni; ;'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-10: kun nas brgyad gnyis mdzes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-12: 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-14: mtshams dang mtshams su 'ang bam ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-15: ji lta ba bzhin bsnyems bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-16: srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-17: srid bu bzhi yis nye bar sbras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-18: sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-19: rta babs sengge dag gis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-20: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-21: bla res steng du bres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-22: rin chen rdo rje pad ldan sngon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-23: dpag bsam shing gi lcug mas khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-24: bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-25: rgyan phreng glang po ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-26: phyi rol gnas te legs par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-27: rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-28: dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-29: gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rje bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-30: mnyam par gzhag cing spro ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-31: sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-32: de nas lha mo zhal bzhi ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:303b-33: shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-1: bzhi ba la spyan yangs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-2: phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-3: zhi ba'i g-yas par rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-4: g-yon pa padmas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-5: dkar dang dmar po cher sngo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-6: sngo bsangs rin chen mchog mdzes 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-7: gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-8: gtsug rgyan con pan dam pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-9: skal ba chen po 'od ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-10: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-11: gos kyis stod ni legs bsgribs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-13: sna tshogs gos ni legs gyon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-14: dbu ma'i zhal ras gser gyi 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-15: zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-16: mdun na rin chen bdun gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-18: zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-20: rgyab tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-21: dpa' bo de yis bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-22: 'di yi mdun du bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-23: dpa' bo mtha' yas pa yi zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-24: stong phrag du ma'i phyag ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-25: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-26: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-28: sna tshogs phyag rgyas phyag gzhan dkrigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-29: gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-30: dbu rgyan padma'i bzhin ras ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304a-31: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-0: dpa' @304b bo'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-1: dpa' bo des ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-2: rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-3: der ni bsnyems pas 'gro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-4: dpa' bos lho ru bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-5: gshin rje'i 'dab ma mdzes pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-6: mchog sbyin nam mkha' dge ma yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-7: rin chen khri la legs par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-8: bzhin ras sngo la spyan dkar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-10: mgul rgyan rin chen phreng ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-11: rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-12: yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-13: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dgongs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-14: de nas blo ldan rab song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-15: nub tu yang ni de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-16: dpal dang ldan pas legs par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-17: chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-18: dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-19: gtsug na cod pan gyis spras ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-20: sprul rgyan sna tshogs lus can ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-21: dar dang rin chen gyis klubs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-23: phyag gi lo 'dab dang ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-24: zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-25: nyi ma du ma'i snang ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-26: ji ltar rigs pa bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-27: de nas byang du phyin nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-28: song ste dpa' bos bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-29: mi g-yo bzhin ras grags chen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-30: mar gad 'bar ba mtshungs pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-31: dkar po'i dar gyis yang dag klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-32: gtsug na nor bu cod pan bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-33: gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag gis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:304b-34: rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkra ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-1: tshogs rgyan dang gos ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-2: zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-4: de nas mtshams kyi 'dab ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-5: me tog bdug pa dri ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-6: rdo rje snang byed dag pa ma'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-7: mchod pa sngags rig pa yis bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-8: gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-9: rang gi bdag po'i phyogs su'o; ;'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-10: bzhad dang sgeg dang dbyangs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-11: gar gyi phyag rgya grags chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-12: sngags pas 'bad de bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-14: thams cad du ni 'grub pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-15: sgo rnams dag ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-16: sgo skyong ba ni rnam bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-17: phyi rol du yang lha la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-18: ming ni yang dag bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-19: de nas khrus byas lus byugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-20: me tog bdu ga sogs kyis bdug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-21: sna tshogs gos ni rab gyon la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-22: me tog phreng dang gos kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-23: gtsug phud cod pan dang ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-24: mdzes pa'i dar gyis yang dag klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-25: rdo rje dril bu lag par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-26: sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-27: de nas thams cad dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-28: rdo rje ma mo dka' thub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-29: bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-31: rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305a-32: lan gsum du ni g-yas bskor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-0: @305b rdo rje ma mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-1: dam tshig ldan pa thams cad byon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-2: glu dbyangs kyi ni rgyal pos bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-3: rang gi slob ma'i tshogs gar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-4: dregs pa yis ni g-yas dang g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-6: 'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sems can don mdzad brtson pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-7: ser sna mi mnga' sangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-8: bde gshegs dam pa'i yum gyur srid pa'i bskyed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-9: pha rol don mdzad dus la de ring bab pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-11: de nas de dag rang nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-13: mtshan ma dag ni bzang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-14: dkyil 'khor dag tu blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-15: rang ngam gzhan la 'bab sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-16: mtshan ma ji ltar mthong ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-17: de tshe nges par ma mo ni; ;bde gshegs thugs kyi dgongs par byon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-18: de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga ji bzhin rab brtags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-19: de tshe babs pa'i sems can bsod nams ldan la bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-20: gal te de ni mi smra ba na h'um gi yi ge dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-21: ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis ni yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-22: de nas shes rab ldan ma gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-23: slob ma'i gtso bo thal sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-24: mig la mig dar gyis g-yogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-25: rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-26: ma mo thams cad la dmigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:305b-27: der ni me tog dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-2: ma mo de ni de yis 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-3: de nas go rims ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-4: sgo skyong ba nas brtsams nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-5: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-6: slob ma la ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-7: dam tshig thob par gyur nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-8: sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-9: ma mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-10: mnyam par gzhag pas bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-11: gzhan du slob dpon blo ngan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-13: de nas kyang yang dag 'grub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-16: rims dang gdon dang dug sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-17: gdungs te nad kyis rgyun du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-19: rdo rje slob dpon smad pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-20: rtag tu dmyal ba nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-21: rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-22: mkha' las rdo rje ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-23: des na bu kye dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-24: khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-25: ma mo kun gyi sdom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-26: theg pa chen po'i cho gas gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-27: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis yum rnams kyi dam tshig bka' stsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-29: rin chen sems kyi dam tshig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-30: rnam pa gsum ni sbyang bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-31: thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306a-32: chung 'bring mchog gi dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-0: de 'dra'i dam tshig yang dag @306b pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-2: ji srid sems ni sbyangs kyi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-3: 'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-4: bud med thams cad mthong ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-5: lan gsum du ni bskor nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-6: spyi bor phyag ni byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-7: lan gsum par du gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-8: bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-9: ji srid byang chub thob par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-10: byang chub yan lag nu ma las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-11: byung ma rang gi 'o mas skyongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-12: de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-13: dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-14: gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-15: dri yi rgyas ni yongs bkang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-16: dar dang ras sogs kyis g-yogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-17: me tog chun pos mgul brgyan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-18: rin chen sman gyis rab bkang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-19: gcig lhag bcu drug bzang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-20: ma mo'i snying bo nyid kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-21: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-22: sngags shes pas ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-23: slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-24: thog mar zhu ba byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-25: zhabs gnyis la ni mgos btud nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-26: bdag ni che go mo rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-27: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-28: slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-29: dbang bskur phyir ni zhu ba bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-30: skal ba chen po bdag la stsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-31: slob dpon mchog tu rmad byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-32: dbang bskur rgyal ba thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-33: sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-34: des ni bdag gi sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:306b-35: don gyi dam pa bdag gis bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-2: brtul zhugs bzang po khyod kyi drin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-3: de nas dbang bskur sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-5: slob mas ye shes rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-6: go 'phang la ni gzhag nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-7: bum pa bzang po gcig gam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-8: yang na bcu drug dag gam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-9: lnga 'am yang na bcu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-10: dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-14: ge sar lte ba ldan par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-15: de yi dbus su rdo rje bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-16: sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-17: de yi mdun du 'khor lo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-18: chen po rin chen bdun gyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-19: lho yi phyogs su rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-20: nub tu padma nyid yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-21: byang du ral gri chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-23: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-24: me tog bdug pa dri zhim pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-25: 'od ldan pa ni skal ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-26: sgo dang sgo ru bzhi nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-27: phyi rol tu yang mi 'chi kun ///
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-28: gcig nas gcig tu rgyal sgrogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-29: bde byed gcer bu'i cha lugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-30: ming thos pa dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-31: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-32: slob ma bsnyems dang bcas pa bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-33: chos kyi rang bzhin gtam brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-34: de ring khyod ni rigs su skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-35: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307a-36: rtag pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-0: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal @307b dag pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-1: rdo rje padma lag byin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-2: gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-3: bu yis bya ba chen po gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-5: der ni sbyor ba 'ongs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-6: gsang ba'i sdom pa sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-7: 'di la mchog tu dga' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-8: yum rnams rab tu rmad byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-9: dus su 'dod pa nyid du gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-10: dam tshig mchog tu gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-11: brtul zhugs bzang pos ci 'byor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-12: de nas yon ni phul byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-13: slob dpon gyi ni zhabs la btud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-14: ma dang chung ma bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-15: srid mo sring mo'i bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-16: bu rnams dang ni bdag nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-17: rgyal po longs spyod gter dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-18: nor dang 'bru dang grong shing rta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-19: glang po rta dang ba glang sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-20: ma he dang ni ma he mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-21: gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-22: bla ma la ni chen pos dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-23: bya dang mi bya rdzas kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-24: thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-25: de nas bcom ldan ma rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-26: rgyan phreng rnams dang bzhad gad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-27: sgeg dang rtse 'jo dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-28: rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-29: bz'a btung bca' ba la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-30: rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-31: mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-32: sems can kun gyi don dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-33: bdag gi yang ni ches cher mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-34: bde gshegs gang du gshegs pa der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:307b-35: ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-0: shes rab ldan pas yon phul @308a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-2: slob ma'i mchog dang bcas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-3: gar byas lag pa mgor bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-5: de nas bzang mo rnam mnyes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-6: thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-7: bdag gis skal bzang stsal nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-8: rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-11: thugs rdo rje ye shes yum chen mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang ba'i dus pa las byung bar rang rang gi sgrub pa'i tahbs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-13: shes rab ye shes mchog sgrub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-14: sems dpa' chen pos gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-15: thabs kyis sems can thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-16: sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-17: rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-18: rdo rje'i sku ste rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-19: dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-20: rdo rje chen pos gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-21: thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-22: gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-23: sems can rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-26: rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308a-27: dpa' bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-0: @308b dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-1: las kun gyi ni 'bras brnyes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-2: sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-3: sems can rnams kyi yab chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-4: sna tshogs dam pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-6: de nas bcom ldan rtag pa'i rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-7: dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-8: gsung mchog nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-9: zab mo yi ni chos bka' stsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-10: 'di ni sgrub po gang yang med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-11: dngos grub bam ni sgrub thabs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-12: thabs cad rnam par rtog las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-13: rnam rtog kyang ni dmigs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-14: bdag med sangs rgyas rnams kyang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-15: chos rnams med cing chos nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-16: sbyor ba med cing sems can med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-17: de bzhin pha dang ma yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-18: byed pa med cing skyong ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-19: 'bras bu med cing rgyu yod min //longs spyod med cing za po med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-20: shes med shes pa po yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-21: rnam shes med cing shes bya med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-22: brdzun min bden pa'ang ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-23: des na snang ba thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-24: sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-25: de ltar chos rnams rnam rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-26: grol nas gos par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-28: sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-29: zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-30: mkhas pa gang zhig dad gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-31: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-33: sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:308b-34: thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-2: sems can rnams la bstan pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-3: de nas yum rnams tshim gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-4: rang byung ba la zhu ba zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-5: grub pa'i sgrub thabs rab sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-6: mnga' bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-7: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-8: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-9: de yi stong du ma nyams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-10: nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-11: phyogs kun tu ni rab 'phro ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-12: de yi steng du gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-13: dus mtha' me dang mtshungs 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-14: de yi steng du sa chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-15: gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-16: de yi steng du chur shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-17: zla ba gang ba kha ba 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-18: sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-19: rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-20: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-21: dpag tshad kyi na tshid tsam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-22: grub bzhi ba la sgo bzhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-23: rta babs bzhi yi rtse mo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-24: ri bo chen po cog brgyad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-25: dbus su rdo rje'i ri bo mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-26: de yi steng du rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-27: kun tu phyogs pa yongs su bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-28: sngo bsangs mar ga ta 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-30: de yi steng du rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-31: rtse mo lnga ba rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-33: 'od zer lnga yis rnam par spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309a-34: de yi steng du rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-1: sna tshogs 'od zer stong gi phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-2: phyogs bcu nam mkha' khyab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-3: de yi gtsug tu padma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-4: nam mkha' khyab pa yi ni mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-5: lo ma stong phrag du ma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-6: lte ba dang ni ze'u 'brus dkrigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-7: de yi mdun du nyi ma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-8: 'od zer stong phrag du ma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-9: de yi steng du zla ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-11: nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-13: de yi dbus su ma mo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-14: dus gsum bzugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-15: yongs su dag pa mkha' 'dra ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-17: phyag gnyis ma la thugs zhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-18: bsam gtan spyan ldan bsam gtan yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-19: bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-20: ser mo gzhon nu rab bzhad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-21: dkar po'i gos 'dzin mdzes pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-22: dkar po yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-23: ral ba'i thor tshugs cod pan bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-24: gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-25: ye shes gdan la mnyam par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-26: ba spu rnams kyi rtse bug gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-27: rgyal ba rab tu 'phros pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-28: byang chub pha rol son par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-29: de yi thugs kar rnam bsam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-30: yi ge mchog tu mi 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-31: yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-32: thams cad du ni legs 'phro ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-33: sangs rgyas rnams ni mdun gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-34: rab tu thal mo sbyor ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-35: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-36: rig sngags khro bo'i tshogs kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-37: chos nyan pa yi tshul du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:309b-38: dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-2: sgo skyong ba ni bzhi rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-3: sbyin pa la sogs ci rigs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-4: bcu drug po'ang gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-5: me tog bdug pa mar me che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-6: ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-7: lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-8: dri za lha min dmyal las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-9: 'di rnams thams cad lhun po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-10: kun nas yongs su gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-11: de nas me tog phreng ldan 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-12: dri dang me tog yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-13: gos dkar 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-14: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-15: shes rab 'phro dang lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-17: bdag dag pas ni dag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-18: shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-19: sgo yi drung du legs 'khod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-20: glu 'di yis ni spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-21: thugs rje mnga' ba chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-22: rang gi yab kyi tshogs dang sras dang bcas te byon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-23: spyon cig spyon cig lha dang sring mor bcas mchod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-24: 'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub thugs mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-25: spyon cig spyon cig thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-26: chos kyi yi ge bde bar gshegs pas rjes bskos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-27: mkha' ltar yongs dag dri med dam bca' dran par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-28: ma mo rnams ni mchog glus bskul bas byon par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong nas rang gis me tog gi snyim pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-1: aom bdag gi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-2: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-3: de nas de dang lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-4: 'dres pa ru ni gyur bar bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra dzny'a dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-6: de nas 'di yis brtan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsa la sa ma ya ma tsa la stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma na santu sti sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-10: ae hye hi dza: ae hye hi dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-11: de nas dpag tu med pa'i ngo mtshar chen po lta ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-12: aom sarba aangga punda ra ma h'a bha ga b'a na sa la sma ra sma ra spha ra spha ra sarba aangga aa b'a yu bi kshnu ma h'a buddha sa mu dr'an h'um h'um aam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-13: 'di yis ma mo bskul nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-14: sangs rgyas sprin ni 'od po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-15: dkyil 'khor ba la spro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-16: de nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-17: bsngags te me tog dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-18: aom sarba aangga punda r'i ka pra t'i tstsha dh'am ku su m'anydza lim h'um aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-19: de nas ji ltar bsahd pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa rnams la rig sngags 'dis ji ltar bshad pa ltar legs par byin gyis brlabs la rang gis dbang bskur rang gi snying po rang gis blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-20: de nas las thams cad kyi nus pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-21: dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-22: de nas me tog la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-23: bza' dang btung dang ro dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-24: mchod la sngon gyi rim pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-25: slob ma'i rgyal po gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:310b-26: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rim pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-1: ba yis ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-2: rdo rje rin chen de bzhin pad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-3: las kyi rdo rje de bzhin no //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-6: ral gri mig sman thur ma gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-7: rgyal po'i nye bar spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-8: de la rgyan rnams bstan nas su //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-12: dam tshig gam ni sdom pa yang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-17: ci 'dod par ni bya ba byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-18: las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos slar yang las dam pa rgyas par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311b-16: zas kyi sa bon dang ni bza'//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311b-34: nag po'i phyogs la bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311b-35: de yi bshang ba'i mar khu las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311b-36: dud pa mkhas pas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:311b-37: de yis mig la byugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-0: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs @312a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-4: mig sman dang ni ba lang mar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-5: ma he dang ni ra nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-6: mi yi mig sman nyid dag ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-12: mi snang 'grub pa thams cad kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-28: de nyid kyi ni spyi bo'i char //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-33: sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312a-34: de ni kun gyi rgyal dbang po //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312b-20: thams cad bdag tu bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312b-21: de las langs te bdag zhi bas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:312b-25: skad cig de la bdug pa dang //
