K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-1: dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-2: sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-3: gnod sbyin mo ni nges par 'gugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-4: sha dang khrag gi bdug pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-5: srin mo 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-6: tsandan si hla'i bdug pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-7: lha ni 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-8: ga bur tsandan bdug pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-9: sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-10: ga bur gang gis zos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-11: gzhan du'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-12: rig pa chen mo yi ge bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-13: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-14: 'khrugs pa dang ni spel ba'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-15: nges par shi ba bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-16: brtul zhugs can gyis gang bsgo ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-17: bka' lung de yis myur du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-18: phrag par khur de bran mo des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-19: lhun po'i steng du skyel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-20: grub pa yi ni mchog rab kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-22: gtsum po yi dvags nyi ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-23: rgyal gyi mtshan mo sol ba bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-24: gtum mo'i me tog khu ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-25: brtul zhugs bzang pos btags nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-26: padma'i nang du gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-27: de nyid mtshan mo gcig gam gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-28: de las blangs te sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-29: mkhas pa yis ni mar zhu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-31: sangs rgyas kyis kyang bsngags pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-32: rig sngags grub pa'i grib ma 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-33: gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-35: dbang ma grub pa'ang dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:314b-36: rang gi khrag gis ming bris la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-1: nyid kyi ni phye mas dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-2: ji srid bskams par ma gyur bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-4: gang dang gang gis lha dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-5: rim pa 'di yis ming bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-6: khro bo ldan pas bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-8: de yi bka' bzhin byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-9: ngang gis de ni dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-10: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-11: gsad pa'i don du sngags rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-13: zhal bzhi pa la cher 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-14: zhags pa lcags kyu thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-15: bdag nyid myur du bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-16: gsang sngags dang ni spel ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-17: ming ni sol bas bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-18: gdug pa de ni mnan nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-19: rang gi gdug pa'i sems kyis bsnun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-21: nges pa ru yang nges par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-22: khams kyis bon dang spel ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-23: khams kyis ming ni bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-24: khams de yang dag mnan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-25: khang pa ru ni rgyun tu bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-26: de ni myur du nges 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-27: de srid du ni mi g-yor gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-28: rma bya'i sgro 'am gtsug phud kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-29: yongs su blangs la bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-30: rma bya zhes bya'i rtsa ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-31: mkhas pa yis ni yongs su bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-32: dmag la sngags rig pas bskor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-33: de nas dmag dpung 'jig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-36: khyi dang phag dang bya rog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315a-37: mig ni yongs su blangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-0: @315b mig sman dang ni mnyam por bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-1: lha mo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-2: sgrub pa po yi gzugs rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-4: tsandi'i me tog bcud nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-5: lcags kyis g-yogs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-6: de yi kha ru nges bcug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-7: rga shi med par rnam par rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-8: rims gtong gzugs ni legs bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-9: de yi kha ru gnod byed ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-10: sbyor ba yis ni bcug nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-11: yongs su mnan la shin tu bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-12: rims gtong de yi gzugs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-13: rab tu 'dzin par gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-14: gza' 'am yang dag yi dvags sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-15: gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-16: gzhan pa yi ni nad rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-17: 'dzin pa la ni dpyad mi dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-18: gshin rje bris te bskrad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-19: de yi zhal du dgra bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-20: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid mi 'gro na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-21: de ni myur du nges par 'chi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-22: gsad pa la yang 'di nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-23: yongs su mnan nas nges par bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-24: gang du gter ni yod snyam gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-25: der ni sngags rig pas song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-26: lce yongs bzung la bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-27: de yis gsal po'i tshig gis smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-28: tshad dang yod dang med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-29: bgegs dang bgegs ni ji ltar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-30: ji srid de ni dgyes smra na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-31: de la gtor ma sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-32: gal te bgegs ni mi smra na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-33: der ni mchod yon rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-34: bus mo gnyis btsugs gus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-35: nor 'dzin sangs rgyas yum las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-36: phyogs bzhi dag tu phur bus gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:315b-37: de nas gnas rnams bskrad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-2: mnyam par bzhag ste bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-3: sbyor ba shes pas sngags 'di yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-4: de nas rdzas ni gdon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-5: aom ba su de sarba aartha s'a dha ni s'a dha ya s'a dha y'a yu dha ra raksha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-6: sarb'a rtha ni tsa yam tram tram tsa tsa ta ta ha ha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-7: yang na rig pa 'di yis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-8: las rnams dag ni thams cad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-9: phyogs bcing ba dang de bzhin bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-10: phur bu bskrad pa de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-11: rin chen gsum ni thog mar sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-12: cha gcig dang ni nor 'dzin la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-13: sdug bsngal can la cha gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-14: grogs po rnams la de dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-15: lhag ma rnams ni rigs pas dpyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-16: dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-17: gzhan du sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-18: rgyal po chom rkun sogs 'jigs las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-19: gal te bla ma der bzhugs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-20: skal ba bzang po gnyis dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-21: gzhan pa yi ni spyan rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-22: rdo rje theg pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-23: skal ba re ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-24: gzhan du dam tshig gdung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-26: gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rjes gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-27: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-28: yum rnams kyis ni de rab btud nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-29: dpa' bo che la zhu ba zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-30: rgyas pa yi ni dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-31: gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-32: yum rnams kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316a-33: rgyal po'i dbang phyug rab gsol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-0: de nas bcom @316b ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-2: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-3: dkyil 'khor ji ltar sngar gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-4: 'o na kyang seng ge'i khri dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-5: de yi steng du padma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-6: der ni ri bong can dkyil 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-7: de yi steng du nyi ma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-8: nyi ma der ni dkyil 'khor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-9: cha brgyad pa la dbus rin chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-10: de yi steng du rgyal ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-11: ser dang sngo ba'i 'od chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-12: gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-13: phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-14: g-yas pa yis ni mchog sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-15: g-yon gyis rin chen lan bu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-16: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-17: gos ni 'phyang zhing sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-18: gtsug tor mu tig thor tshugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-19: de yi mdun du rin chen bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-20: g-yon du bum pa bzang po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-21: g-yas pa ru ni dpag bsam shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-22: rgyab tu rin chen lan bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-23: mtshams rnams su ni bum pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-24: gser gyi rang bzhin bzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-25: rin chen lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-26: dri lnga dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-27: bza' la sogs pa'i ros gang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-28: bum pa bcu drug phyi rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-29: ser po'i gos kyis yongs su dkris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-30: me tog ser po sogs kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-31: de bdun blo ldan bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-32: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-33: dmar dang ser dang ches dkar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-34: rin chen ldan pa'i phyag sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-35: ser po'i 'od ldan phreng mdzes ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:316b-36: rin chen bzang po kun gyis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-1: yi nyi zla skar ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-2: kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-3: gtsug phud cod pa na gos la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-4: phreng ba dang ldan dges pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-5: de yi lho ru bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-6: tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-7: cung zad ser ba'i rin chen lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-8: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-9: sna tshogs gos ni yongs su gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-10: mdzes pa'i phreng ba'i chun po'i gtsug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-11: gos ldan gtsug na gtsug tor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-12: yid bzhin rin chen dam pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-13: g-yon pa'i skyil krung rin chen bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-14: cho ga ji bzhin rab tu bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-15: rgyab tu bzod pa ma zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-16: cung zad 'dzum zhing ser mdzes ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-17: dmar po'i gos ni legs par gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-18: rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-19: thams cad rin chen mchog 'dri zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-20: dmar po'i gos ni 'phyang ba ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-21: gtsug na rin chen mchog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-22: seng ge mchog gi khri la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-23: byang du brtson 'grus chen mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-24: rdo rje go chas brgyan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-25: dpa' mo rin chen dbyug gu'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-26: g-yas pa sbyin pa'i pha rol song //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-27: pri yang ku la sngo bsangs dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-28: rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-29: lhag ma rnams ni bzhag bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-30: dkyil 'khor byas te rin chen ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-31: sgo dang sgo ru sgo ba ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-32: rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-33: de nas phyi yi phyi nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-34: rin chen snyim pa'i lag pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-35: phyogs skyong ba ni thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-36: go rims bzhin du gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317a-37: de yi phyi rol thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-0: mkhas pas klu dang gnod @317b sbyin bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-1: rin chen bum pa bzang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-2: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-3: gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-4: lha bshos rab tu bzang dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-5: bza' dang btung ba'i ro mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-6: mar dang ka ra nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-7: zho dang bu ram hvags dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-8: 'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-9: rgyal po'i bza' ba dang dam pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-10: bza' ba la sogs rab mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-11: de nas sngags pas 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-12: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-13: ser po'i gos 'dzin dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-14: phreng ldan dri zhim ldan pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-15: sgo yi char ni zhugs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-16: thog mar lha ni spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-17: phyag rgya bcings te dbyangs snyan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-18: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-19: lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la sman slad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-20: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dran mdzod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-21: rin chen dam pa seng ge'i khrir bzhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-22: 'khor bcas lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-23: de nas de dag legs byon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-24: sras bcas 'khor dang bcas rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-25: sems can rnams la dngos grub ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-26: sgrub pa po la khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-27: de nas thal mo legs sbyar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-28: rin chen gyis bkang me tog bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-29: gsang sngags brjod de gtor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-30: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-31: de nas rang gi dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-32: de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-33: sa la lag pas re gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-34: bsnyems pa yis ni 'then par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-35: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-36: me tog dris ni yang dag sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:317b-37: ser po'i gos bzang yang dag gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-2: dga' dang bcas te snyim pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-3: snga ma'i sngags kyis dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-4: gang gi drung du lhung gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-5: lha de de yis 'grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-6: de nas g-yas nas rnam bskor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-7: slob ma de ni 'byung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-8: bzang po'i seng ge'i khrir bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-9: dbang bskur ba yi sbyor ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-10: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-11: mdzes pa'i rnga yab g-yob pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-12: de bzhin du yang dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-13: bum pa brgyad dam bcu drug la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-14: de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-15: go rims ji lta ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-16: de nas sbyor ba der 'ongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-17: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-18: 'khor lo rin chen bzang po'i lag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-19: rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sgra dge bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-20: gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-21: lte ba ru ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-24: dam tshig gi ni dam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi don rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-26: 'bad pas de ring blangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-27: phongs pa'i dri ma 'phrog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-29: rin chen tshogs kyis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-30: gzhan pa yi yang du ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-31: rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-32: de bzhin dbang bskur lnga bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-33: skal med kyang ni bdag med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-34: gling bzhi dbang phyug dpal ldan yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-35: gnod pa med par thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-36: gsang ba las kyang ches shin tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318a-37: gsang ba yi ni mna' bsgags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-0: de yi bsgom dang @318b sgrub pa'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-1: slob ma la ni de nas bslab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-2: gur gum dang ni tsandan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-3: dri dang mar me bzang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-4: dam tshig gis ni gsal byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-5: lan gsum du ni 'thung du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-6: bu kye 'thungs shig gsang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-7: dam tshig shin tu 'da' ba dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-10: shi nas kyang ni dmyal sdug bsngal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-11: rab mang du 'bod nyid du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-12: gal te mi ru skye 'dod pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-13: nam zhig dngos grub thob 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-14: de bzhin phongs pa'i sdug bsngal las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-15: ring du nges par khyod kyis skyobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-16: 'di dag legs thos slob ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-17: gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-18: ji lta'i rgyal rigs bu mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-19: bzung nas gsal ba'i rnal 'byor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-20: nyi ma bdun na nges par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-21: rgyal po'i phun tshogs thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-22: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-23: dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsam gtan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-24: rgyal mo cho ga bzhin bzung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-25: sgrub pa pos ni myur du sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-26: nyi ma gsum gyi rgyal po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-27: gdon mi za bar tho ba par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-28: bram ze'i bu mo skal chen mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-29: nor chen la ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-30: rje rigs sna tshogs sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-31: mtshungs pa nyid du bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-32: de yis dngos grub mchog rnyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-33: rgyal po 'jig rten gsum gyis rjed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-34: dmangs mo dpa' bo'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-35: bsgrubs na sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-36: gnod sbyin rgyal mchog grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:318b-37: gnod sbyin rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-0: @319a *// dman pa'i sems su bshad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-1: mchog gi mchog ni chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-2: bar mas bar ma'i dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-4: de nas las rnams bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-5: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-6: de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-7: gzhan pa yi yang sna tshogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-8: sems can rnams la dga' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-9: shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-10: dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-12: 'od zer dkar pos mdzes pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-13: skye bo nad pa 'chi ka ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-14: de yi lus la gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-15: de nas de ni stobs ldan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-16: brgyad gnyis pa yi lang tshor ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-17: nad rnams kun las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-18: rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-19: bstan bcos kun gyi don rig cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-20: shes rab dran pa mchog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-22: nam mkha' la ni yang dag bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-23: mdzes pa'i rin chen sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-24: thams cad du ni char 'bab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-25: 'di yis phongs pa rnam par sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-26: phongs pa rnams la rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-27: the bong yi ni tshad tsam pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-28: nor rgyun ma yi rnam pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-29: lha mo la ni mnyam par gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-30: de yi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-31: ji srid 'bum phrag kho na ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-32: de nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-33: zla ba gang ba'am bcu bzhi 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-34: brgyad pa'am gzas gzung nyin par la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319a-35: mchod pa chen po byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-0: mkhas pas mtshan mo thog thag @319b bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-1: de nas dga' bas gzugs brnyan der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-3: de nas bzung ste mdor bsdu na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-5: bzlas pas mtshan ma bzang byung na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-7: bar mas gling ni thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-8: tha ma yis ni khor yug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-9: thams cad du ni bzlas tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-10: longs spyod zad par 'gyur ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-11: rgyal po thams cad dbang 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-12: bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-13: snying gar rnal 'byor byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-14: nor bu lag par bcangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-15: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-16: myur du rin chen rgyal por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-17: phyag rgya 'di ni byas gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-18: rtag tu sgom pas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-19: ji ltar 'dod pa'i grub rnyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-21: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-22: de nas sbyor ba ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-23: yum de rnams ni legs byon nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-24: las kyi dkyil 'khor legs gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-25: ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-26: gang du rgyal ba kun bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-27: bla na med pa'i don mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-28: sems can kun la bde slad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-29: myur du las ni 'grub pa legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad kyi dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi dam tshig dam pa de rnams la las kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:319b-32: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-2: de yi steng du lha mo bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-3: 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-4: zhal bzhi ma la cher 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-5: mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-6: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-7: rdo rje lcags kyu thod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-8: zhags pa g-yas dang g-yon par 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-9: pags pa chen po gos su gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-10: khro mo mig 'bras rab phyung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-11: mche bas mchu mnan zhal chen mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-12: de yi mdun du bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-13: mtha' ma'i zhal ni mdor bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-14: sna tshogs gtum dang drag po'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-15: du ma'i phyag gis yang dag 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-16: zhags pa lcags kyu thod sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-17: rdo rje can gyi sog le 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-18: thod pas lus la bres gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-19: cod pan chen pos 'jigs byed mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-20: gshin rje dpa' bos bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-21: mtha' gdong dam pa yi ni mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-22: sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin khros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-23: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-24: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-25: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-26: ral grib rin chen thod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-27: rin chen dbyug gu 'dzin pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-28: de nas lha mo legs bri ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-30: dmar mo phyag na nyi zhal 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-31: bskal ba'i me dang mtshungs pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-32: g-yon pa ru ni khro mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-33: ma bcom ma ni ska rags mgul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-34: las kyi rdo rje dril ldan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-35: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-36: gtsug na thod pa 'jigs su rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-37: rab gtum stobs dang gsal ba mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320a-38: 'byor ldan cho ga rig pas bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-0: phyi rol tu ni legs @320b bri ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-1: khro bcas 'jigs pa dang bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-2: ral ba'i thor tshugs chen po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-3: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-4: phyag rgya bzang pos phyag mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-5: de yi phyi ru lha rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-6: snyim pa rab sbyar yi dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-7: thams cad du ni yongs su gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-8: 'jig rten skyong ba gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-9: sgo rnams dag ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-10: sgo skyong ba yang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-11: de nas gtor ma'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-12: sha bcas btung ba ro dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-13: de nas go cha bcings gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-14: thod pa'i cod pan chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-15: khrag gam chang gis bkang ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-16: thod pa ldan pas 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-17: thams cad 'grub pa'i ma mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-18: 'di yis spyan ni drang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-19: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-20: gsang ba'i don du ma mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-22: 'jigs chen ma rnams thams cad gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-23: 'jigs pa'i sgra dang cher gtum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-24: kha nas 'od zer stong phrag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-25: mthong ba dang ni thos pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-26: mtshan mar yang ni shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-27: de nas de yis aargham sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-28: ci bder bzhes shig 'jigs mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-29: gdug pa chen po gsol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-30: gdug gtum 'jigs par byed pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-31: de nas bdag la dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-32: thod par gnas pa'i ro yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-33: srang tsam gyi ni sha zos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-34: ma mo thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-35: de nas mngon spyod las rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-36: dam tshig bsrung ba yis ni bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:320b-37: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-0: @321a *// bla ma rnams la 'khyal smra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-1: rtag tu gsod par lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-2: bgyid par bdag ni rjes su gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-3: de nas cho ga de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-4: slob ma'i dam pa gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-5: khro bo'i lha la bskul nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-6: me tog dmar po dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-7: bdag gi me tog dam pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-8: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-9: bdug pa 'di ni bzung nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-10: gsol byed 'di ni gsol bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-11: lha mo gang la lhung gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-12: de yis de la mchog gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-13: de nas dbang bskur byin nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-15: thod pa ru ni gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-16: khrag gis dbang ni bskur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-17: de nas sgo ru bos nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-19: rab tu gdug pa'i snying gi khrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-21: zo zhig zo zhig sha chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-24: mkha' 'gro ma dang gza' rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-25: gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-26: ring por mi thogs rab tu za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-27: de nas mngon spyod las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-28: stong phrag dag ni bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-29: de yi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-30: rang nyid khro bor bzung gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-31: gnod byed thams cad gsad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-32: dgra rnams thams cad bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-33: gdug pa thams cad bca' bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-34: srin po thams cad gzhom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-35: mtha' yas zhal ma'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321a-36: gsad dang gzung ba de yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-1: zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-2: thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam pa'ang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-3: mkha' gdong ma yis thams cad rin po che tshogs 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-4: padma'i zhal gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-5: chang gi dam pa btung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-6: ma bcom ma yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-7: sha ni 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-8: nam mkha' rengs pa chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-10: rmugs dang rmongs pa thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-11: dpyad pa ru ni mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-12: sngar bshad pa yi las rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-13: ma bshad pa la ci 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-14: bzlas pa tsam gyis kun bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-15: thams cad du ni the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-16: dur khrod kyi ni thal bar ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-17: dgra bo'i gzugs ni 'bad pas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-18: ming dang spel bar byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-19: ma mo'i ral gris btub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-20: de nas nyi ma bdun na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-21: brlag par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-22: gang lus ji ltar bcad gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-23: de dang de yi yan lag 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-24: zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-25: sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pas bcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-26: de yi mgrin par zhags pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-27: mkhas pas sbrel te bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-28: lcags kyus snying gar phug nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-29: rlung gis bskyod de drang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-30: de nas de yi ming bskul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-31: de ni shes rab ldan pas dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-32: dman dang mchog gi dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-34: mdor bsdus pas ni shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-35: sngags pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:321b-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-0: @322a *// de yis dngos grub gsol mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-2: gdon dang gnod sbyin srin por bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-3: mi bzad nad kyis btab nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-4: shin nas mnar med nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-5: de nas de bzhin dbang bskur gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-6: dkyil 'khor la bzhag yum rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-7: dbang bskur gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-8: gsang ba'i sgrub thabs nyan du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-9: rang yum ma mo'i sa bon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-10: rang gi rnam rtog bdag yum min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-11: lta bus yab gyur bsgrubs na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-12: nyi ma bdun na rab tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi yab ston pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-14: kun mkhyen ye shes spyod yul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-15: drag po kun dang bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-16: ye shes kun gyi mchog gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-17: shes rab kyis ni thams cad bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-18: las rgyas pa yi dam pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-19: bye brag tu ni bskul nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-20: byang chub kyi ni yon tan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-21: thams cad du ni 'od gsal ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-22: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-23: shes rab kyi ni las dbye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-24: gzugs dang dbyibs nyid dag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-25: phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-26: de bzhin dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-27: bza' ba dang ni nyer spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-28: gtor ma lha bshos nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-29: shin tu bde ba'i stan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-30: de dang de ni nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-31: bzlas dang bsam gtan sa bon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-32: rang gi lus khyab pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322a-33: gsang sngags dag ni thams cad las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-0: gsang sngags 'di ni rab tu bsngags @322b tshe 'dir dam pa'i rjes grub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-1: gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-2: 'di ni bcom ldan kun rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-3: ye shes 'byung gnas mnga' bdag gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-4: las kun gyi ni sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-7: phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog tu dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-8: ye shes chen pos gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-9: gang gis mngon par rgyas btab kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-10: mnga' bdag dus mi ring bar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-12: phyag rgya rtags su yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-13: tha snyad tsam du rnam par btags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi kla klo'i skad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-15: phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bshad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-16: 'on kyang mgon po mchog gi brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-17: lag pa'i rnam dgod mtshan ma nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-18: gang gis yid ches legs skye rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-19: dam tshig shes pa'i lha rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-20: sgrub po rnams kyis rab bskul na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-21: grub pa'i dam pa rab tu stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-22: dus las thams cad byon nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-23: slar yang gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-24: lag pa zla ba nyi mar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-25: shes rab thabs su rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-26: de nas sngags pas yongs su sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-27: rang gi sa bon ngag gis mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-28: aom pra dzny'a p'a ya sa m'a yo ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-29: de nas thal mo nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-30: phan tshun rjes su rtogs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:322b-31: khu tshur shin tu gzhag par byar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-2: so so ru ni sbyor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-3: snying gi dbus su nges par bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-4: g-yon pa'i steng du lag pa g-yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-5: bzhag ste sor mo so sor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-6: lag g-yas bsgreng nas phyogs kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-7: 'khor lo'i sbyor bas spro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-8: rdo rje sgo lcags lta bur bskum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-9: sor mo thams cad rtsibs su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-10: aom sarba dharma tsakra sa m'a ye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-11: de bzhin g-yon pa yongs su spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-12: sor mo rtsibs kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-13: shes rab steng du bsgreng bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-14: g-yas pa yang ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-15: rtse mo cung zad sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-16: chos kyi las ni chen po byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-17: de nyid mnyam du bskums pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-18: las kyi phyag rgya zhes su grags de bzhin ming med byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-19: lhag ma rnams ni gdong du sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-20: phyag rgya chen po shin tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-21: dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-22: phyag rgya 'di rnams bsdams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-23: rang nyid shes rab bdag por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-24: kun tu bzang po rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-25: lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-27: de nas ma mo de rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-28: slar yang gtso bo la bstod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-29: shes rab chen po rnam bzhi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-30: phyag rgya zhu ba rnam par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-31: phyag rgya bzhi yi rab kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-33: gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i yal ga mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-34: shes rab thabs kyi lus bzang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-35: gang zhig gsan ba'i rnal 'byor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323a-36: gang gi rnal 'byor ba bde ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-1: bcom ldan ston pas bka' stsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-2: gsad pa'i phyag rgya rgyal ba'i gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-3: gang gi myur du sgrub po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-4: rab tu bde bar gnas pas 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-5: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-6: mnyes te gsang ba'i dam pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-7: phyag rgya'i pha rol phyin pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-8: bde ba chen po rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-9: rdo rje thal mo dam par bsdams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-10: rdo rje dbus su gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-11: gsang ba'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-12: gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-13: de nyid rdo rje lta bur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-14: bskyod pas bde ba skyed par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-16: phyag rgya gsang ba bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-17: g-yon par thabs ni bskums nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-18: bskyod pas bde ba 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-19: dag pa'i las zhes rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-20: bde ba thams cad rab stsol byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-21: de nyid kha dang rkan la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-22: sbyar ba chen mo zhes su bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-23: rdo rje phan tshun yang dag sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-24: lcags kyu'i kha ni bskyod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-25: kha ni phan tshun yongs sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-26: gsang ba'i zhags pa zhes su grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-27: de bzhin bskums par byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-28: dam du bsdams te bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-29: 'di ni gsang ba bsdams pa'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-30: ye shes bsdams pa rab tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-31: thams cad rdo rje ltar rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-32: de bzhin bskyod cing bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-33: de 'di gsang ba rab tshum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-34: tshim pa'i don ni ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-35: lhag ma phyag rgya chen por //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-36: shes bya phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-37: de nyid las kyi phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-38: las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:323b-40: de nas ma mo de rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-1: ni tshim zhing mgu ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan yangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-3: legs so ba ni nges par phul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-4: legs so legs so gsang chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-5: legs so legs so mchod chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-6: legs so legs so rnal 'byor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-7: legs so legs so rab tshim mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor zhu ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-10: sangs rgyas rang bzhin khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-11: spyod pa'i rin chen khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-12: dam pa'i rgyu gyur khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-13: sna tshogs mdzad pa khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-15: gsang ba'i chos ldan khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-17: mgon po khyod la bdag cag zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-18: bdag gis dkyil 'khor zhu ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-19: mnga' bdag rgyal dang sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-21: de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-22: dbus su pha rol phyin ma dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-23: dh'i zhes bya ba shes rab can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-24: thabs dang ldan pas gsal byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-26: zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-27: rig pa 'di yis de yi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-28: las rnams thams cad byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324a-29: dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-0: @324b zhi bas zhi ba zhes su bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-1: brnyes ma zhes pas rgyas par bsahd //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-2: dbang dang dgug rang dbye ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-3: byed ma'o dbang la drag mo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-4: sha yi mtha' ru bdud gsod ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-5: gsod pa dang ni spel bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-6: 'gro ba dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-7: sor mo zhags pas dkri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-8: thams cad du ni drag po dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-9: drag po drag po'i go 'phang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-10: 'di yi cho ga ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-11: las kyi tshogs kyi mchog kun bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-12: sems la rnal 'byor legs bsam ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-13: brgyad brgya brgya kho na bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-14: dbang bcas nyid dam dbang chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-15: stobs kyis mgo bo mnan nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-16: ma mo'i tshogs kun de yis bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-18: gzi brjid chen pos bka' bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-19: mgo bos nye bar phyag 'tshal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-20: 'di yi ma mo thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-21: gzi brjid kyis ni gzi ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-22: sngags kyi rgyal po 'od ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-23: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-24: dpe zla med pa'i dngos grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-25: grub pa'i lam la rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-26: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-28: 'di na ston pa chen pos gsungs ma skyes skye ba med la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-29: rtag pa ston pa thams cad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-30: nam mkha' nyi zla dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-31: de dag thams cad rab dga' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-32: dngos po spangs pa'i btsun mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-33: gar dang glu dang sil snyan mchog [?] bzhad dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-34: bud med sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-35: gling bu pi wang rdza rnga sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-36: ting ting shag dang dung sgra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:324b-37: ro dang reg pa dri chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-2: dpa' chen la ni mchod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-3: snyems dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-4: slar yang mgon po la gsol btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-5: rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-6: mgon po ci yi phyir mi gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-7: yab rnams kyi ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-8: yum rnams kyi ni mdor bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-9: mchod pa yang ni thams cad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-10: bran bcas pho nya pho nya mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-11: 'jig rten pa ni mtha' dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-12: gtso bo chen pos gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-14: de dag nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-16: thugs rdo rje la gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-22: thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa bsgyings pa dang ldan pa la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-23: de nas yang bde ba yongs su skyes pa rab tu dgyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lhan cig sbyod pa dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-24: bran dang bcas pas de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-25: mgon po dbang phyug rdo rje sems /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-26: rdo rje snang ba mdzes pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-27: gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-28: dpa' po chen pos gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-29: gang gis rgyal ba kun bskyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325a-30: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba @325b rgyan gyi bkod pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-1: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-2: zhu ba rab tu zhus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-3: gang phyir nga la dngos med kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-4: zhu ba zhus pa thams cad thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-5: gsang ba chen po'i smon lam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-6: de bzhin snying rje'i pha rol phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-7: dran pa med las dran pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-8: dran 'gyur dran po bzhin gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-10: shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-11: chos dang chos min rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-12: brjod du med pa bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-13: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po bka' stsal ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-14: slar yang glu'i dbyangs 'dis zhu ba zhus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-15: chos dbyings mi g-yo bde la legs bzhugs dam pa'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-16: phyogs bcu mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyis zhabs legs btud pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-17: bde mchog lha yi lha ste sa dbang 'jig rten bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-18: dkyil 'khor bde ba mchog la bzhugs gsol bde chen gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-19: sa gnyis gtsug gis phyag byas bde ldan padma'i gtsug tor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-20: rnam pa kun tu gar mdzad sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs shig kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-21: 'gro kun phan dgongs rab tu bzhugs gsol mchod pa chen po kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:325b-22: cha lugs rnam pa du mas 'gro kun 'dul mdzad kun gyi dam pa kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams @326a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-1: cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bskul ba'i tshig nyid kyis thugs la bzhag nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba chen po rab tu sim pa bde ba la longs spyod pa rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-3: bde ba chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba la rab tu gnas nas nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-5: thugs rdo rje rnams las rab tu phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-6: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-7: de yi lte bar 'di dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-8: rdo rje chen po bsam gtan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-9: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dag dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-11: kun gyi thog mtha' rab byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-12: de la sogs pa'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-13: thams cad kun tu brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-14: padma'i lo ma rtsibs la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-15: rang gi chos dang rab tu spel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-16: ma mo rnams ni thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-17: mchod pa la sogs rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-18: sgo ru sgo ba yongs su brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-19: sgo yi phyi ru sgo skyong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-20: btsun mo lhan cig spyod bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-21: kun nas lha rnams gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-22: de nas rang gi sa bon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-23: klu dang gnod sbyin 'phar ma gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-24: dri za rnams dang mi'am ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-25: lha min nam mkha' lding de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-26: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-27: sgo ru gnyis gnyis gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-28: gdon dang dug dang rims dang nad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-29: yi dvags sha za srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326a-30: dmyal ba brgyad po phyogs brgyad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-0: 'khor lo'i phyi @326b ru bzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-1: de nas 'khor lo'i mu khyud bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-2: chen po rin chen bdun rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-3: de yi sgo ru bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-4: shar du 'dod chags skye gnas lag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-5: zhe sdang drag po lus gnag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-6: byang du legs par bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-7: gti mug nub tu bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-8: lho ru nga rgyal nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-9: sog le dang ni gos nag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-10: de bzhin dbyug gu 'jigs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-12: de nas ji lta ba bzhin 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-13: de nas gsang ba rdo rje'i phyag rgya ngas par bcings pa'i lag par gyur pas rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran pas phyag rgya de nyid kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-15: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-16: 'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sangs rgyas zhal ras sangs rgyas dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-17: bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa mtha' dag gis bskor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-18: 'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs padma'i spyan ras pad las 'khrungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-19: dam tshig rnam dag rnams kyis dpa' bo dam pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-20: glu dbyangs rgyal po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-21: rdo rje'i blo gros nges par bskul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-22: byon 'gyur song shig song shig ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-24: tshim zhing tshim la rab tu tshim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-25: zhugs shig zhugs shig 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-26: kva kye zhes brjod bskul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-28: de nas me tog dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-29: bcom ldan bde bar bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-30: lha dbang gang la lhung 'gyur bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:326b-31: de yi sgrub thabs brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-2: sgrub byed sgrub po dam pas byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-3: de nyid du ni dbang bskur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-4: rnal 'byor ba ni mkhas pas blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-5: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-6: rgyan rnams kun kyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-7: dar la sogs pas gdong g-yogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-8: phyag rgya bcings pa'i lag bzang pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-9: de bzhin du ni me tog dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-10: sa ma ya stvam bdag gis brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-11: ma tog gang la lhung gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-12: de yis sbyor bas dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-14: sbyor ba bsgoms te dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-15: yang na bdag po'i rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-16: gal te de ni sbyor ldan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-17: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla bre sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-18: bhring ga ra yi bum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-19: rnga yab rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-20: seng ge'i khri ni bzang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-21: gser dang dngul gyi dbyug gu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-22: rin chen dbyug gu du ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-23: dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-24: dbang bskur spro ba chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-25: de ni stan la bzhag nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-26: rnal 'byor ldan pas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-27: dbang bskur ji ltar rigs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-28: gsang ba'i sbyor bas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-29: thog mar sdom pa ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-30: de ni dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-31: 'dir ni nga yi dam tshig gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-32: phyir dang gsang ba rnam pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-33: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-34: sangs rgyas ye shes rab gsal byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327a-35: gdug pa thams cad gsad pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-0: @327b lta ba ngan la brdzun du smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-1: srog chags gsod la smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-2: gzhan gyi bud med mngon bgrod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-3: ci bde bar ni phrogs shig bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-4: gzhan rdzas 'phrog par byed rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-5: dkon mchog gsum la 'gal byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-6: gsang dang gzhom par bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-7: de bzhin khrag rnams btung ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-8: 'bad pa yis ni thams cad byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-9: dam tshig rnam pa gsum bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-10: de nas yon ni phul nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-11: bla ma la ni gus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-12: zhabs la mgo bos nges gtugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-13: rang lus rgyal po'i longs spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-14: chung ma'am yang na bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-15: bu rnams dang ni bran nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-16: sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-17: ma dang rang gi mna' ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-18: grong dang yul gyi longs spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-19: shing rta 'gro dang glang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-20: rnam par bkra ba'i rta rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-21: nor gyis gang ba'i grong rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-22: ba glang ma he re rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-23: lug rgod rnams dang gzhan rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-24: rnga mo mdzes pa'i rnga mo mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-25: gzhan yang gzhan yang gang 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-26: ji ltar rigs pas mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-27: rim bzhin rang gi slob ma'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-28: mgon po mchod nas gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-29: gang gzhan rdo rje spun la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-30: de nas sgrub thabs dam pa bslab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-31: srog dang thur sel sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-32: sems kyi brtan pa nyid du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-33: zla ba nya ba lta bur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-34: cha shas dag ni bcu drug kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-35: de yi dbus su rnam bsam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:327b-36: gtso chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-1: bsdus nas ni spro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-2: brtul zhugs can gyis rang lus bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-3: bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-4: 'dod pa'i zil gyis mnan nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-6: lha dbang bcas pas phyag 'tshal zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-7: nad dang mya ngan 'jigs pa sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-8: rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-9: zla ba gcig tsam bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-10: dpa' bos las kun byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-11: zhi dang rgyas dang de bzhin dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-12: drag shul spyod pa rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-13: dgug dang dbab pa'i las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-14: skad cig tsam zhig bskul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-15: sngags pas thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-16: sngags kyi sbyor bas sngags zlos pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-18: yan lag lnga las skyes pa gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-19: 'byung po'i nyi ma mtshan mo gung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-20: lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-21: rang gi kha ru gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-22: bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-23: de ni nang par mthong ma 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-24: lhar bcas grub pa'i sems can gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-25: thams cad rnam pa kun tu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-26: bskal par gnas shing shes rab che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-27: bstan bcos thams cad rab tu mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-28: gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-30: bcu bzhi'i nyin par shi ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328a-31: rdol pa'i g-yon gyi rtsib logs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-0: gzugs brnyan lag pa bzhi pa @328b bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-1: zhags pa lcags kyu rtse gsum mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-2: g-yon par thod pa 'dzin pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-3: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-4: spyan gsum rnam par gtsigs pa pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-5: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-6: gtum ldan sta zur chen po pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-7: 'jigs pa chen po'i dur khrod du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-8: rnal 'byor ldan pas de gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-9: chog ji bzhin mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-10: gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-11: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-12: khrag dang sha dang mar khu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-13: de nas lha mo de 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-14: mtshan ma yang ni blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-15: mtshan ma yis ni dngos grung che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-16: dus mi ring bar bzang po 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-17: dman pas dman pa'i dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-18: bar ma yis ni bar ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-19: mtshan ma med na chung du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-20: rab tu 'grub par dpyad mi dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-21: lha min bzang po dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-22: mi dang mda' ni bskul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-23: de yi skad cig nyid la byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-24: khrag nyid kyis ni bris pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-25: dbang du bya ba'ang 'di nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-26: de bzhin bud med thams cad dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-27: 'grub pa'i rdzas kyang ming nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-28: dgug pa'i sbyor bas dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-29: dmag dpung rnam par bzlog pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-30: rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-31: rengs dang rmugs par byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-32: rmongs dang 'ching ba de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-33: dbye dang gsad pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:328b-34: cho ga dag dang ldan pas byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams dang yab rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil @329a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-1: 'khor gyi zhu ba chen po 'di zhus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-2: gang la bzhugs nas rgyal ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-3: yum dang yab rnams de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-4: de yis sbyor bas sbyor bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-5: sems can rnams ni snod du mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-6: gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-7: rnal 'byor chen po'i rnam dbye ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-8: gang gis ma 'ongs mi rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-9: bde bas bsangs rgyas nyid la 'jog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-10: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-11: 'dzum dang bcas pa'i sbyan rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-12: gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-13: gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-14: gang phyir bdag nyid dkyil 'khor bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-15: sems can dag pa'i rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-16: bdag nyid gsang ba'i rgyan zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-17: snying po phyag rgya sngags nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-18: bdag nyid rig sngags dam tshig kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-19: gang phyir bdag nyid sdom pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-21: pha dang ma rnams de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-22: dngos grub sgrub po las kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-23: bde dang sdug bsngal khams gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-26: yab rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-27: de phyir gsungs shig bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-28: bde bar gshegs pas gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-29: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329a-30: phan dang bde ba thob pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @329b yum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-1: yab nye bar longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-4: thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-5: sngon bshad cho ga'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-6: dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-7: de yi dbus su bdag bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-8: dkar dang dmar dang 'od chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-9: sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus la spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-10: dmar po'i phreng ba gtsug tor can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-11: sna tshogs gos ni legs man bas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-12: dmar po'i 'od kyi bla go can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-13: phyag bzang g-yon na dril bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-14: bsnyems bcas 'dzum bag ldan pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-15: phyag gzhan na ni rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-16: snying gar rab tu gsor mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-18: zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nyi shar mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-19: rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-20: dmar po'i gos ni 'chang ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-21: mdor bsdus nas ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-22: g-yon du shes rab yongs su bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-23: sngon bshad pa yi gzugs can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-25: lho ru sbyin pa chen mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-26: phyag rab rin chen stsol ba mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-27: byang du bzod pa chen mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-28: byams pa'i ya lad 'dzin pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-29: mdun du brtson 'grus chen mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-30: rdo rje'i lag pa cher bzang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-31: shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-32: bsam gtan pha rol phyin ma bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-33: bsam gtan phyag can spyan yangs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:329b-35: bden bral du ni 'phel ma bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-2: nor gyi rgyan ni stong phrag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-3: sems can mang po bde bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-4: smon lam bri bya rlung gi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-5: mtshams su yang dag mtshon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-6: dbyangs snyan pa yi ngag brjod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-7: sems can thams cad bskul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-8: blo gros ldan pas dbang ldan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-9: thabs kyi ye shes slob pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-10: lag pa gnyis kyis gar byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-11: sgeg dang dga' bas 'khrugs pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-12: dpa' bos shar sgor bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-13: shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-14: ye shes lcags kyu mdzes pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-15: dmar po'i dar gyis mngon par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-16: dbang ni nub kyi sgo ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-17: 'ching ba'i bdag nyid bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-18: shin tu byu ru dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-19: rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-20: byang gi sgo ru bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-21: stobs kyi pha rol phyin ma mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-22: rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-23: dril bu bzang po 'khrol ba'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-24: gshin rje cho 'phrul bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-26: phyag na rdo rje zhags bkra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-27: rdo rje'i glog phreng dang mtshungs ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-28: nga yi mdun du shes ldan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-29: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug brgyan pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-31: mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-32: de yi mdun du dkar po bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330a-34: zla ba shar ka'i 'od mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-0: 'dzum bag can la gzhon nu'i @330b gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-1: rdo rje 'dun pa cher dmar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-2: mda' lnga dang ni gzhu 'dzin ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-3: skye ba 'joms pa dpa' bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-4: lag na 'khor lo gzi brjid mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-5: de yi g-yon du bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-6: dkar dang dmar pa'i 'od chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-7: rdo rje jed [?] sgrogs rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-8: dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-9: de yi rgyab tu bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-10: gser dang gur gum dang 'dra ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-11: lho yi phyogs su bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-12: mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-13: sngon mo char sprin dang 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-14: lag na ral gri rin chen ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-15: de mdun dpa' chen 'dod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-16: rgyal po bdag nyid chen po bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-17: 'od zer dmar po lag na gzhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-18: rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-19: de yi lho ru bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-20: rdo rje rnam par smod pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-21: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lag pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-22: rab tu rno ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-23: rdo rje dam pa 'dul mdzad dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-24: rdo rje rin chen mchog gi tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-25: kha dog dkar po cher spro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-26: gos sngon rnam par 'phyang ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-27: rdo rje d'aki'i dbang phyug rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-28: lag na rin chen shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-29: de yi rgyab tu bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-30: dgod dang bcas ba'i bzhin ras mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-31: nga yi rgyab tu bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-32: dri yi dbang phyug dbang phyug che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-37: dkar ser bzang po sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-38: lag na autbala sngon po bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:330b-39: de yi g-yon du dag pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-4: lo ma'i rtse mo rgyab tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-5: lag na yid bzhin nor bu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-6: kha dog sngo bsangs dpa' chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-7: sems dpa' ldan pa'i thugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-8: de yi lho yi cha ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-9: chos 'chad mchog ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-10: rgyu mtshan phyag ldan rab dkar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-11: nyi ma shar ka'i snang ba 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-12: nga yi byang du bri bya ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-14: shin tu ljang ba'i ma rgad mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-15: las kyi rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-16: de yi mdun du bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-17: rdo rje skyong ba yid 'phrog bkra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-18: bzhad bcas rdo rje'i lag pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-19: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-20: de yi lho ru bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-21: 'gro ba'i rtse mo legs brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-22: lhang tsher nag po bung ba 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-23: rdo rje'i gsal shing 'dzin pa po //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-27: 'dzum bcas mchog tu ngo mtshar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-28: 'khor byed g-yon du bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-29: lag na mgal me'i 'khor lo can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-31: rab rgyas padma lta bu'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-32: de nas sgo yi cha dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-33: sgo ba rnam pa bzhi po bri //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331a-37: lag na rdo rje zhags pa 'bar //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-4: shar du mda' yi mtshon cha lag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-7: sngon mo dbang phyug rdo rje ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-8: lag na rin chen snye ma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-9: rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-10: rdo rje nyer zhi dkar mdzes ma //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-14: rdo rje steng zhal mdzes ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-15: sngo bsangs kun gyi yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-16: lus ngan du ni shes ldan gyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-26: nub byang du ni bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-27: lag na yi ge sna tshogs bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-28: lag na sgron me rab dmar ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-30: dri yi glang po ltar 'gying ba'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-34: rdo rje'i lag pa mig mdzes ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-35: de yi shar du bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-36: rdo rje mchog gi 'od ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-37: rdo rje dbang phyug bde ba ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:331b-38: de bzhin lho ru bri bya ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-4: nub kyi dkyil 'khor dag la bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-5: 'od kyis snang zhing mdzes pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-6: lag na 'od zer legs mdzes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-7: rdo rje brang skyes cher bkra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-8: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-9: lag na sna tshogs gos ldan pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-11: de bzhin sbyor bas bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:332a-12: pho nya mo yang legs par bri //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:333a-26: chu lhar tshangs pa chen po ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:333b-4: rags shing stan las mi g-yo ba'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:333b-13: ser po'i gos 'dzin gnag pa po //
