K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337a-24: de nas 'di yis me tog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337a-25: phreng ba bzang po dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337a-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta m'a t'a pi trim pa ti ma h'a su kha sa manta bha dra pra t'i tstshe dam pushpa aanydza lim smri du dza: h'um bam ho: bha ga w'a na mah'a su kha sa manta bha dra sa ma ya stvam sa ma yo nya ham//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337a-27: 'di yis bzung ste myur ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337a-29: de ni blangs te spyi gtsug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-0: blo gros bzang pos bcing @337b bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-1: sngags pa'i rgyal pos sngags 'di yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-2: de nas mig ni rab tu dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-3: aom badzra dzny'a na ma h'a ne tra aud gha da ya ti tsakshu shi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-4: mgon po chen po ltos shig bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-6: ye shes chen po kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-8: rim pa ji bzhin legs bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-9: dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-10: dbang bskur ba ni yid 'ong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-11: skal ba chen po bdag la gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-12: gsang ba yi ni rgyan zhes par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-13: rgyal bas gang sngon bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-14: gsang ba'i sbyor de bdag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-15: rgyal ba kun dngos stsal du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-16: de bzhin dkyil 'khor bum pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-17: de bzhin dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-18: slob ma chen po rnam pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-19: der ni sbyor bas bos nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-20: gsang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-21: dngos grub shes pas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-22: gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam 'phrul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-23: der ni mchu yis legs bzung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-24: lce yi rtse mo mkhas pas sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-25: rdo rje 'am yang na chu skyes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-26: phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-27: de nas 'dzin ma rnam par sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-28: de nyid la yang mkhas pas sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-29: gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-30: gsang ba'i bde ba bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-31: zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-32: de nas yon ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-33: bla mar phyag 'tshal mchod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-34: ma dang bu mo nyid dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:337b-35: srid mo yi ni bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-2: rgyal po longs spyod skye bo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-3: grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-4: nor dang rin chen la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-5: gzhan yang ci dang ci 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-6: mkho ba'i longs spyod gus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-7: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-8: dngos grub kun gyi don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-9: dkyil 'khor ba yang legs par mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-10: pha dang spun yang mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-11: de bzhin spun zla'i bu yang mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-12: bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-13: gos dang rgyan dang me tog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-14: de bzhin dri dang bdug pa sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-15: ji ltar bdog pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-16: mchod pa byas te gtang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-17: lha rnams dag ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-18: de bzhin du ni mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-19: gsang sngags rgyal po gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-20: badzra mu: zhes brjod pas gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-21: de nas sngags pa'i slob ma'i mchog de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-22: gsang ba rnam par 'dzin la gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-23: rgyal pos gsal mdzad rgyal ba'i gsang bdag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-24: gsang ba mtha' dag legs par bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-25: gsang ba'i phyag rgya mig yangs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-26: blo gros brtan pas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-27: rang byin rlabs pa'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-28: shes rab kyis ni byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-29: bdag nyid sems dpa' legs bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-30: gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338a-31: nyi ma bdun gyis legs 'grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-0: @338b lha mo shes rab che de yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-1: rang nyid rdo rje 'chang gtso ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-2: nam mkha' kun gyi mchog dpa' bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-5: bdag nyid 'dod par dgongs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-7: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gtso bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-8: de yang 'dod pa'i dbang lha mor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-10: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-13: mkha' 'gro'i sa bon bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-14: de ni sbyor bas spros nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-15: rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-16: bcug nas rin chen chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-17: srid pa 'joms par bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-18: yid bzhin rin chen rang bzhin mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-20: 'dam skyes dmar po'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-21: 'bad pas kun nas dri yis dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-22: dri yi dbang phyug rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-23: bdag nyid sems dpa' yid ches bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-24: de nas myur du blo ldan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-25: dri za'i bdag po'i bdag por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-26: dri yis myur ba nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-27: brtan dang g-yo ba'i dug 'gugs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-28: don yod kyi ni dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-29: snying po snying gi sbyor ba bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-30: yid la bsam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-31: de yi phyag rgya'ang de dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-32: rin chen gyi yang rin chen che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:338b-33: rin chen gyi ni mig 'od gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-3: de la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-4: lha gzhan dag kyang rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-5: dkyil 'khor ram ni dam tshig kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-7: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-8: rig sngags kyi yang sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-9: de rnams kyis ni de nyid na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-10: bsgoms na myur du nges par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-12: gsang ba rgyan bdag dam pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-13: phyag rgya bzhi yi mchog gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-17: yum de rnams kyis gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-18: myur du sbyor ba mchog bsgrubs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-19: sgrub pa pos ni ji ltar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-20: de dag thams cad myur du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-21: bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bdag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-22: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-23: rig sngags kyang ni legs par sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-24: btsun mo mchog gi gnas dbang phyug //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-25: dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba rnam par bgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-0: yum rnams kyis zhu ba'i @339b tshig rdo rje 'di nyid kyis sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-2: thugs rdo rje rnams las rnam par phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-3: lha rnams kyi ni snying po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-4: sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-5: dkyil 'khor du ni legs par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-6: ji ltar sngon du kha dog sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-9: sems can rnams la phan bde'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-10: rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-11: mtshan ma la sogs dam pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-12: de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-13: rdo rje dam pa gsor mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-14: lag pa'i mtshan ma bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-15: gang gi lha rnams mtshon 'gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-16: lag pa zla ba nyi ma ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-17: mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-18: shes rab thabs kyis pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-19: rdo rje padmar rnam bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-20: de nas shes rab pha rol phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-21: sor mo'i rtse mor dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-22: de nyid sbyor ba'i bsdus nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-23: phan tshun nges par sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-24: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyar ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-26: 'ching ba chen pos bcings nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-27: lha mo'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-28: gsang sngags rgyal po sngags rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-29: yang dang yang du byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-30: bcangs te 'od ldan rnam pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-31: brgyang nas rtse mo sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-32: de 'di snying po zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:339b-33: gnyis pa grags pa ldan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-2: rim gyis snying gar bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-3: rdo rje mnyam par sbyar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-4: der ni bcings pa gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-5: 'di ni dam tshig nges bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-6: dam tshig ma lus sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-7: 'di yis lha mo mtha' yas zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-8: thams cad du ni nges par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-9: de nyid bsdigs pa lta bur sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-10: las kun byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-11: rdo rje gnyis ni padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-12: sbyor ba bstan pa mchog tu rmad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-13: de las phyi rol bskums pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-14: gsum pa ru ni 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-15: snying ga ru ni snying po bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-16: snying dga' byed pa zhes byar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-17: rdo rje gnyis po de bzhin sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-18: dam tshig bdag byed nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-19: de nyid kun gyi 'byung gnas gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-20: chen po'i las ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-21: de nyid mdzod spur sbyar ba'i brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-22: phyag rgya bdag nyid chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-23: de nyid chu skyes rnam pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-24: snying gar bzhag pa snying po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-25: de bzhin rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-26: dam tshig bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-27: snying gar kun bsdigs sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-28: rab rgyas pa yi bzhin ras mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-29: bsnyems pa byed pa thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-31: de nyid kha ru sbyar bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-32: phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-33: de nyid 'od ldan rtse mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340a-34: thur du bstan te snying gar gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-1: snying po'i chos sgrub byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-2: de nyid snying gar yongs su bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-3: snying gi dkyil 'khor nyid du bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-4: 'di ni dam tshig dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-5: bdag nyid chen pos bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-6: las kyi rdo rje mnyes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-7: las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-8: dbab dang 'khor ba nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-9: gar byed chen po de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-10: de bzhin thal mo sbyar nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-11: snying gar bzhag pa snying por bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-12: spyi bor bskor ba byas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-13: dam tshig ces bya bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-14: steng du bsdigs pa las su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-15: mchod pa ma lus rab sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-16: snying po la sogs 'og tu gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-17: chos la sogs par yongs su brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-18: de nyid brgyang ste snying gar bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-19: snying po zhes su legs par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-20: bskor ba dam tshig ces bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-21: las thams cad ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-22: de las thal mo rdo rje gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-23: steng bsgreng snying po la sogs bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-24: sngon bshad lha mo thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-25: gsang sngags rig par shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-26: gnyis su byas la g-yas min pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-27: bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa bzung nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-28: mngon par phyogs te gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-29: gzugs kyi snying po ches che pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-30: de nyid kha yi phyogs bzhag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:340b-31: sgra yi snying po yid 'phrog pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:349a-7: dbye ba bzhi ru brtag par bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351a-33: shes rab kyis ni snying gar bsnun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351a-34: de las gnyis pa sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351a-35: snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351a-36: skar ma rdo rje'i rnam pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351a-37: bzod dang gzi brjid mche ba mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351a-38: de nyid dam du bsdams pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-0: 'ching ba'i las @351b ni byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-1: 'di rnams kyis ni thams cad sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-2: phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-3: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-4: las kyi dam pa ma lus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-6: de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-8: gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-9: dpal chen la ni zhu ba zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-10: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor don phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-11: ma mo rnams kyi don dam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-12: yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-13: sangs rgyas kun mchog dam pa'i gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-14: dkyil 'khor thams cad brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-15: mdzes pas bcom ldan gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-17: dang po dang ni gnyis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-18: drug dang lnga dang de bzhin bcu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-19: mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-20: rdo rje rin chen chu skyes las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-21: rang gi dkyil 'khor go rims kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-22: gsang sngags 'dzin pas gnas lngar dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-23: dkar dang ser po ches dmar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-24: sngon po'i 'od zer glog las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-25: tha ma kun gyi thog ma ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-26: 'od zer bzang po sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-27: rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-28: gnas nas bsgom dang bzlas pa sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:351b-30: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams kyi rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-2: dus mi ring bar sa stengs 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-3: 'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-4: kun sbyor dri ma med pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-7: de nas rgyal ba thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-8: sbyor ba'i ma dang yum rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-9: legs tshig rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-10: bde ba che la legs zhes gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-11: rdo rje kun gyi bdag po gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-12: sangs rgyas dbyangs kyis bstod par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-13: rdo rje glu sogs sbyar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-14: dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ldan gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-15: dpal ldan sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bdag po tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-16: sangs rgyas nas ni rgyal rnams chub mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-17: sangs rgyas sras po nges par mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-18: sbyor bas blo gros sprin rnams legs par tshim mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-19: dpal gyi rdo rje dri med rdo rje ye shes rdor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-20: rdo rje'i snang bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-21: bsdus pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba ldan pas legs bton te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-22: rdo rje'i bdag nyid ngo bor mdzad pa'i mdzes rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-23: dpal gyi rin chen rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen sprin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-24: rin chen rnams la rin chen gyis dgyes rin chen mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-25: mdzes pa'i brjid ldan rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-26: skye bo rnams kyi phongs dang sdig pa rnams bcom nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352a-27: dpal gyi padma padma dam pa'i bla ma pad sems dpa'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-0: @352b padmas rab dgyes padma las 'khrungs padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-1: dra bas padma mtha' dag nges par rgyas mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-2: padma'i rigs la 'jog par mdzad pa'i pad bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-3: sna tshogs dpal ldan kun gyi bdag po sna tshogs mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-4: sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs yum gyis ma gos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-5: sems can rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog mdzad sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-6: ci dga' 'dod la rig pa dam pa gnang du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-8: de nas de rnams kyis slar yang sems can ma lus pa 'dul ba'i don du 'di skad ces bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-9: sangs rgyas tshul khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-11: sangs rgyas ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-13: sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-14: rdo rje khro bo'i yid las 'khrungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-15: sdig pa bcom pa khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-17: phyag na rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-18: gtsug na rin chen gzi brjid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-19: sdug bsngal bcom pa khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-21: chos kyi dag pa khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-22: padma dag la rtogs pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-25: sna tshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-26: sna tshogs sbyor ba khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:352b-27: sna tshogs tshul can khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-2: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-3: chos dang ldan pa thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-4: nyin re zhing ni bstod byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-5: bsam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos shes rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-7: ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-9: gsang ba rgyan ces bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-10: sems dpa' chen po legs par bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-11: sems dpa' chen po ni dga' bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang phyug rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-13: dpa' bo chen po ci gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-14: rang byung ye shes pha rol son //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-15: chos kun dbang phyug dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-17: ji skad gsungs bzhin snying la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-18: legs gzung dri med ye shes bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-19: rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-20: bde ba chen po bdag gis bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-22: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-0: yum gyi tshogs dang bcas @353b pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bu'i rdo rje la legs par gnas pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang sngags rjes su dran par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-3: thugs gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-4: rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-5: sgyur byed kyi mkhas pa sgra yi gzhung lugs la blo gros dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-6: mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-7: dregs pa'i dra ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-8: rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar zab 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-008:353b-9: bsgyur la 'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongs //
